scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run bundle:js:min && npm run bundle:css:min && npm run static
scripts.bundle:css:min: npm run bundle:css && cleancss public/css/styles.css -o public/css/styles.css
scripts.bundle:js:min: npm run bundle:js && minify public/js/bundle.js --out-file public/js/bundle.js
scripts.clean:npm: rmdir /s node_modules || (npm run echo:nowarning && rm -rf node_modules)
scripts.clean: npm run clean:npm && npm run clean:public
scripts.debug: npm run clean:public && npm run lint && npm run bundle:js && npm run bundle:css && npm run static
scripts.echo:nowarning: echo "Ignore Command not found warning. That's for deleting file in Windows"
